title: The Conversation with Luke Thompson that Paul Vanderklay Didn't want you to see!
description: Luke Thompson's first conversation with Paul Vanderklay.  For whatever reason Paul chose not to publish it. Luke doesn't know why, but now you can watch it on Grail Country.
